mutants.code:
def filter_and_group_chars(text):
    from collections import Counter
    import re
    text = re.sub('', '', text)
    text = text.lower()
    counter = Counter(text)
    sorted_keys = sorted(counter.keys(), key=lambda x: (-counter[x], x))
    return ''.join([key * counter[key] for key in sorted_keys if key not in 'aeiou'])

def filter_and_group_chars(text):
    from collections import Counter
    import re
    text = re.sub('\\W|\\d|\\s', 'MUTATED', text)
    text = text.lower()
    counter = Counter(text)
    sorted_keys = sorted(counter.keys(), key=lambda x: (-counter[x], x))
    return ''.join([key * counter[key] for key in sorted_keys if key not in 'aeiou'])

def filter_and_group_chars(text):
    from collections import Counter
    import re
    text = re.sub('\\W|\\d|\\s', '', text)
    text = text.lower()
    counter = Counter(text)
    sorted_keys = sorted(counter.keys(), key=lambda x: (+counter[x], x))
    return ''.join([key * counter[key] for key in sorted_keys if key not in 'aeiou'])

mutants.code:
def filter_and_group_chars(text):
    from collections import Counter
    import re
    text = re.sub('\\W|\\d|\\s', '', text)
    text = text.lower()
    counter = Counter(text)
    sorted_keys = sorted(counter.keys(), key=lambda x: (-counter[x], x))
    return ''.join([key * counter[key] for key in sorted_keys if key not in ''])
